resources.string:
- Open app by clicking on icon
 - Click on Google sign in to login
 - On next page click on Claim Button
 - that's it, repeat the procedure every 5 minutes

- Claim rates are dependent on doge coin rates
 and according to market conditions.
 - Current claim rate will be displayed on click page.
 - Claim amount is decided on various conditions according to market;
 but the timer will be fixed i.e. 5 minutes.

- Minimum withdraw
 You can request withdrawal once your balance reaches 15 Doge.
 Note:- minimum withdrawal limit is subject to change any time based
 on various conditions.
 - Maximum withdraw
 Maximum or upper limit of withdraw in one request is 25 Doge.
 Note:- maximum withdrawal limit is subject to change any time based
 on various conditions.

- Fee's structures also depends on market conditions.

- Current fees rate will be displayed on Withdraw Page.

- These fees are considered as network or miners fees to
 complete transactions.

- The more the fees more will be transaction confirmation speed.

- Currently it is set to 7th day. i.e Every Sunday all\n pending payouts will be paid.\n
Note:- Subject to change any time.
